attributes.action: Withdraw 2007 requirement for company vehicles to display No Smoking signs
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ludicrous element of the Health Act banning smoking in all public places, requires company cars to have a No Smoking sign fitted in a prominent place. Makes them look like minicabs. And for what possible purpose? Worse even than the signs in buildings which have to state that it is "against the law" to smoke. George Orwell, look at this petty totalitarian state and despair!
